channel.title: Tutorials on Ferntech Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Tutorials on Ferntech Docs

item.title: Get Company List
item.description: This URL provides a straight list of companies to which you have access as a Ferntech user: https://api-staging.infinitefingers.com/api/companies/ To get the company list in JSON format, follow the following URL: https://api-staging.infinitefingers.com/api/companies/hierarchy/ The JSON also shows how the companies are related to each other. This is how the hierarchy is represented in the portal: Etiam vestibulum risus vel arcu elementum eleifend. Cras at dolor eget urna varius faucibus tempus in elit.
